title: Hamsa
description:
A blue hand with an eye in the center of the palm.

The hamsa is an ancient symbol important to multiple religions including Islam, Judaism, Buddhism, and Christianity. It represents luck, protection, guidance, feminine power, and faith, among other meanings.
apple_vendor_description: The Hamsa emoji on Apple devices is elegantly designed as a stylized hand, often depicted in a serene blue or white hue, radiating a sense of protection and good fortune. Appleâ€™s signature 3D shading and subtle gloss give it a polished, almost amulet-like appearance, with smooth, rounded edges that feel welcoming. On Apple devices, this emoji is commonly used to ward off negative energy, invoke blessings, or express a desire for safety and prosperity in digital communications.
